xwikidoc.name: XCarouselTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
# Class fields XCarouselCode.XCarouselClass_autoSliding=Auto-Sliding XCarouselCode.XCarouselClass_interval=Interval XCarouselCode.XCarouselClass_carouselWidth=Width XCarouselCode.XCarouselClass_carouselHeight=Height XCarouselCode.XCarouselClass_backgroundColor=Background Color xcarousel.slide_title=Caption title xcarousel.slide_titleSize=Title size xcarousel.slide_titleColor=Title color xcarousel.slide_text=Caption text xcarousel.slide_textSize=Text size xcarousel.slide_textColor=Text Color xcarousel.slide_link=Caption title link xcarousel.slide_delete=Delete Slide xcarousel.slide_addSlide=Add new slide
# Class helper text xcarousel.helper_autoSliding=Will slide automatically at given interval. xcarousel.helper_interval=Time between automatic slides (if AUTO-SLIDING is on), in milliseconds (default is 5000). xcarousel.helper_width=Width in pixels (ex: 1000), if left blank it will take the full width of it's container. xcarousel.helper_height=Height in pixels (ex: 200), if left blank it will take the height of the image. xcarousel.helper_bgcolor=Click the input for color-picker. You can also add the color yourself if you know the CSS id for it.
# Live table generic keys xcarousel.livetable.doc.title=Page title xcarousel.livetable.doc.name=Page name xcarousel.livetable.doc.space=Space xcarousel.livetable.doc.fullname=Page full name xcarousel.livetable.doc.author=Last Author xcarousel.livetable.doc.creator=Creator xcarousel.livetable.doc.date=Update date xcarousel.livetable.doc.creationDate=Creation date xcarousel.livetable._avatar=Avatar xcarousel.livetable._images=Images xcarousel.livetable._attachments=Attachments xcarousel.livetable._actions=Actions xcarousel.livetable._actions.edit=Edit xcarousel.livetable._actions.delete=Delete xcarousel.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Live table specific keys xcarousel.livetable.autoSliding=Auto-Sliding xcarousel.livetable.interval=Interval xcarousel.livetable.carouselWidth=Width xcarousel.livetable.carouselHeight=Height xcarousel.livetable.backgroundColor=Background Color
